titles.title: A bill to provide that certain games of chance conducted by a nonprofit organization not be treated as an unrelated business of such organization.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/4/1993--Introduced. Repeals the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that requires certain games of chance conducted by a nonprofit organization to be treated as an unrelated trade or business for tax purposes.
